Package io.github.zero88.schedulerx

Class DefaultOptions

java.lang.Object
io.github.zero88.schedulerx.DefaultOptions
public final class DefaultOptions extends Object
Instances of this class are used to configure the default Trigger options, and Job options.
Since:
2.0.0

      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • executionMaxTimeout

      public final Duration executionMaxTimeout
      Declares the default max execution timeout. Defaults is VertxOptions.DEFAULT_MAX_WORKER_EXECUTE_TIME
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key PROP_EXECUTION_MAX_TIMEOUT

    • evaluationMaxTimeout

      public final Duration evaluationMaxTimeout
      Declares the default max trigger evaluation timeout. Defaults is VertxOptions.DEFAULT_MAX_EVENT_LOOP_EXECUTE_TIME
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key PROP_EVALUATION_MAX_TIMEOUT

    • triggerRuleMaxLeeway

      public final Duration triggerRuleMaxLeeway
      Declares the default max trigger rule leeway time. Defaults is 10 seconds.
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key PROP_TRIGGER_RULE_PROP_MAX_LEEWAY

    • triggerPreviewMaxCount

      public final int triggerPreviewMaxCount
      Declares the default max number of the trigger preview items. Defaults is 30.
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key PROP_TRIGGER_PREVIEW_MAX_COUNT

    • executionThreadPrefix

      public final String executionThreadPrefix
      Declares the default worker thread name prefix for the execution operation. Defaults is scheduler.x-worker-thread.
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key PROP_EXECUTION_THREAD_PREFIX

    • executionThreadPoolSize

      public final int executionThreadPoolSize
      Declares the default worker thread pool size for the execution operation. Defaults is 5.
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key PROP_EXECUTION_THREAD_POOL_SIZE

    • monitorMaxTimeout

      public final Duration monitorMaxTimeout
      Declares the default max scheduling monitor timeout. Defaults is VertxOptions.DEFAULT_MAX_EVENT_LOOP_EXECUTE_TIME
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key PROP_MONITOR_MAX_TIMEOUT

    • monitorThreadPrefix

      public final String monitorThreadPrefix
      Declares the default worker thread name prefix for the monitor operation. Defaults is scheduler.x-monitor-thread.
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key PROP_MONITOR_THREAD_PREFIX

    • monitorThreadPoolSize

      public final int monitorThreadPoolSize
      Declares the default worker thread pool size for the monitor operation. Defaults is 3.
      API Note:
      It can be overridden by system property with key PROP_MONITOR_THREAD_POOL_SIZE
